author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
Stable release — High-performance driver for APC Smart-UPS with Network Management Cards (NMC). Uses a deterministic Telnet lifecycle and transient in-memory context for sub-5-second telemetry without race conditions or timeouts.

v1.0.2.0 — Improved watchdog logic and deferred command handling; reduced reconnoiter loop risk.
v1.0.2.1 — Fixed checkUPSClock() null reference.
v1.0.2.2 — Stable Core Release: Refined watchdog recovery.
